entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffolding doesn't generate default values #25654
    customer-reported
  • Exploring Scoped vs Transactional (`IDbContextFactory`) `DbContexts` #25653
    customer-reported
  • Recursive Hierarchy in self referenced table - ef core 5 #25649
    customer-reported

Closed

  • HasDefaultValue(constant) #25648
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Issues with builder.HasKey() #25650
    closed-question, customer-reported

Updated

  • Allow [NotParameterized] to work for query filters #25630
    type-enhancement, customer-reported
  • Allow FKs to exist in the model but avoid creating them in the database #15854
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-migrations, Backlog
  • Set TPH discriminator value correctly when discriminator is part of the primary key #21206
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-change-tracking, 6.0.0
  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #19856
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, area-change-tracking, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0
  • "Possible null reference return" in auto-generated compiled model #25647
    customer-reported

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #25652
  • Fix Cosmos update exception wrapping #25651
